title: GDG DevFest Ukraine 2015 Summary
brief: GDG DevFest Ukraine 2015 is now over. It was a great success. We are happy to share with you some facts, emotions and, of course, photos from the biggest Google Developers Conference in Ukraine!

title: GDG DevFest 2017 Announced
brief: Romanian Google Developers Groups are proud to announce the third annual GDG DevFest 2017 which is the biggest Google related event in Romania carefully crafted by GDG community! The event will take place on **6-7th of October** in **Iasi**.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief: GDG DevFest Romania 2017 announced! The 3rd edition of the biggest conference about Google technologies in Romania will take on **October 6-7** in Iasi. That means that it is time to open [call for talk submissions](https://goo.gl/38asyz).
